body:
Here's and album of one of the best Frostbite defences I've ever made :)

http://imgur.com/KZUg4Nl,K2EjjCL,7H93ywg,YWCGati,g16SsMb

. Double obsidian, slab and trap door on it.
. Single-file fence bridge from ladder to monument in case someone makes it there.
. Slab floor.
. All surrounding snow and building demolished.
. Spacey
. Monument high up.
etc.

One of my best, how bout you? :D (post below)

title: Frostbite Defence!

replies.body: I like your defence! Sometimes less is more. I am not a defender myself so I don't have any defences to share, unfortunately :)
